item.title: Concept selection in systems engineering as lenses in Poly
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I had the chance to attend the Mathematics for Governance Design Workshop, where we explored avenues of collaboration between social scientists and category theorists in the task of modelling social dynamics and design of governance structures. Others are writing about the open games engine, but I wanted to focus on an idea that I discussed with Michael “Z” Zargham and David Spivak about systems engineering design and lenses.
